Description:
No body corporate, immaculate presentation, Please contact Agent for Private inspection.
One of only three on the block, without body corporate, this superbly designed and beautifully maintained townhouse is located within walking distance to Doncaster Westfield, close to Eastlink and buses to the City and Box Hill, whilst being modern and private. The living/dining areas are bright and spacious and have large floor to ceiling sliding doors leading out to a wonderful timber deck with a covered roof ideal for entertaining all year round. The generous master is fitted with a large ensuite plus a walk in shower and WIR. A study/retreat provides that extra space to enjoy with a lovely family bathroom and a separate toilet. There is reverse cycle heating and cooling in both bedrooms and the living area. Privacy shutters, modern window furnishings and carpets along with a single lock up remote controlled garage with a shed make this a stylish, convenient and safe home. Nearby Schools are Doncaster Primary, Box Hill North Primary and Doncaster Secondary.

As new designer townhouse in a convenient, quiet location surrounded by transport, schools and shopping options
In a quiet, private setting within a boutique, as new development, this elegant 4-bedroom townhouse is perfectly positioned within an easy stroll to Biralee Primary School, Westfield Shopping Centre, Koonung Trail walking paths and Elgar Park. Generous family accommodation includes a ground floor guest suite, 1st floor main bedroom with walk-in robes and ensuite and 2 additional double bedrooms with robes sharing a glamorous family bathroom with a separate bath, marble vanity and extra-large frameless shower. Casual living is sunny and spacious with sliding doors opening to a rear timber deck and low maintenance gardens with garage access and a garden shed. A well-designed kitchen features 900mm Smeg appliances, generous storage with soft-close cabinetry, a large island bench and designer details such as a seraphic glass splashback and stone benchtops.
Well-appointed throughout with reverse-cycle air conditioning units in every room, timber floors and plush pile carpets, a guest powder room, an auto double garage with a laundry and direct access, privacy glazing, high ceilings and neutral décor.
Close to Elgar Road buses to Box Hill and Deakin University, surrounded by parkland and with easy access to the city or a choice of major shopping centres, this impressive home has significant appeal for young, extended or established families, as well as investors.
